tool_description: Generates return merchandise authorization (RMA) numbers and validates return requests against company policies.

return_reason.description: Reason for return: defective, wrong_item, not_as_described, changed_mind, damaged_shipping

return_quantities.description: Quantities being returned for each SKU

original_condition.description: Whether items are in original condition

error_messages: Order not found: Provide a valid order_id that exists in the system.
Return window expired: Returns must be initiated within the allowed return period.
Invalid return reason: Use one of [defective, wrong_item, not_as_described, changed_mind, damaged_shipping].
Mismatched array lengths: item_skus and return_quantities arrays must have the same length.
Non-returnable items: Some items in the order are not eligible for return based on product policy.
Excessive return quantity: Return quantity cannot exceed originally purchased quantity.
usage: Provide order details and return information to generate an RMA number and validate the return request against policies.

is_approved.description: Whether the return request is approved

return_deadline.description: Deadline for completing the return shipment

return_instructions.description: Special instructions for the return process

approved_items.description: List of SKUs approved for return
